item.title: Anger, disinformation, populism, the sorry state of the world right now... and truth
item.description: This post should be seen through the lens of self therapeutic writing, as I angrily work through a few ideas on my mind. And now, for something completely different. A colleague posted a link to a Breitbart story on Discord, and it got me thinking. The story in question concerned Facebook, Twitter and Google allegedly censoring a viral video of doctors speaking out about alleged disinformation about COVID-19. You’ve probably heard all about that video by now - how the silly thing here is that the actual disinformation was… that exact video.
